Text: The new account info for EOLWith the changes to the EOL database the passsword for the account have been changed as well username gasplasma password gs Bob Hillier said the dsn is the same EOLPROD If it doesnt work we can use EOLPRDUBSWENERGYCOM We can try this tommorow Thanks Franky Sulistio Sr IT Specialist Enron Networks Ph Email franky nroncom Success hinges on a passion for excellence

RE WestRateSheet Cc Mike David Dronet is the best person who could delegate this project to someone else Ill ask him to help with the resource for this project Thanks Franky Original Message From Grigsby Mike Sent Monday October PM To Berutti Aaron Gaskill Chris Cc Sulistio Franky Subject RE WestRateSheet Franky Please delegate this project and any others to someone else Let me know who will be working on these projects while you are away Thanks Mike Grigsby x Original Message From Berutti Aaron Sent Monday October PM To Grigsby Mike Subject WestRateSheet Mike Just wanted to keep you updated on the Rate Sheet project Franky sent me this email this morning Let me know if there is anything I can do for you in the meantime Aaron Original Message From Sulistio Franky Sent Monday October AM To Berutti Aaron Cc Dronet David Subject RE WestRateSheet Hi Aaron I may not be able to get to this WestRateSheet until Mid November because I may be taking week family leave starting this wednesday to care for my son I apologize for the delay Regards Franky Original Message From Berutti Aaron Sent Wednesday October AM To Sulistio Franky Subject WestRateSheet This is the excel sheet that is linked to EOL Listen or we would like to be linked to EOL Listen that hopefully we can make a web page out of so that it can be posted on the plasma screen Aaron WestRateSheet

RE UBSWenergycom data Cc Vladi Try this Original Message From Dronet David Sent Wednesday February AM To Sulistio Franky Subject FW UBSWenergycom data Will this still work Im not even sure what EOL is broadcasting on rvd do you know Original Message From Pimenov Vladi Sent Wednesday February AM To Dronet David Subject UBSWenergycom data Dave it would be great if you guys could fix the EOL listen file before the start of cash trading approx one week from now It is a lot of help and I dont know how am I gonna trade without it thanks Vladi File EOLProductListenxls

FW ERMTP statusPST Original Message From Johnston Jamey Sent Thursday January AM To Sulistio Franky Subject RE ERMTP status Actually the downtime is until Friday at AM There is DB maintenance on all the NetCo database currently going on This was originally scheduled for Friday but was move up until today Jamey Johnston Enron Net Works Sr Oracle DBA Original Message From Sulistio Franky Sent Thursday January AM To Johnston Jamey Cc Pimenov Vladi Subject ERMTP status Importance High Hi Jamey Would you please let us know when the database ERMTP will be back up Its already AM Vladi needs access to the database asap Please let us know Thanks Franky Sulistio Sr IT Specialist Enron Networks Ph Email franky nroncom Success hinges on a passion for excellence Embedded Picture Metafile

ERMTP status Cc PST Hi Jamey Would you please let us know when the database ERMTP will be back up Its already AM Vladi needs access to the database asap Please let us know Thanks Franky Sulistio Sr IT Specialist Enron Networks Ph Email franky nroncom Success hinges on a passion for excellence

FW Please forward to all your employeesPST FYI Original Message From James Giselle Sent Friday January AM To DLIT Front Office Subject FW Please forward to all your employees FYI Original Message From Stock Steve Sent Friday January AM To Nat Steve Wei Zhiyong Ramesh Ganapathy Cc James Giselle Subject FW Please forward to all your employees Please foward to all your NetCo staff Original Message From Hillier Bob Sent Friday January AM To Stock Steve Johnson Jeff Montagne Kevin Guadarrama Michael Cc Webb Jay Subject Please forward to all your employees By there will be a HR person Dave Ciliberto from UBS in the Control Center to answer any questions people may have Please inform your staff that they can feel free to walk in and ask him questions Also Kumar will be joining him sometime this morning Kumar is the VisaImmigration person Here are some answers to a few FAQ that Dave gave me just a few minutes ago Position Applied For Same position you currently have at Enron Salary Desired Same as you are currently making Date you can start Immediately Do I have to list all years of employment Yes to the best of your knowledge What if I can not remember salary or supervisor I can not remember is an acceptable answer Is DWI a felony Yes Note Accuracy is most important therefore if you can not remember something that is on the application state you are not sure Any other questions please stop by and see Dave in the Control Center thanks bbh

Morning Duty Cc PST To all who will be doing the Morning Duty please take some time to check that all the plasmas are operational You can either walk to all the plasma screens or just VNC to it to make sure everything is working Dutch left me a voice mail to ask if I can reset the Financial plasma Unfortunately I was not here at AM For future reference would you morning duty person please monitor the plasma until I get here If you have problems getting the plasma up and running please send email to my pager Thanks Franky Sulistio Sr IT Specialist Enron Networks Ph Email franky nroncom Success hinges on a passion for excellence

Access to the Plasma Chart Cc Dutch Dave Dronet has given you and John Arnold access to our website so that you can view the charts on your workstation Let us know if its not working Franky Sulistio Sr IT Specialist Enron Networks Ph Email franky nroncom Success hinges on a passion for excellence

RE Restricted access to the EOL Ticker AppAnytime after is fine Ill stop by to see if youre available after franky Original Message From Quigley Dutch Sent Thursday October AM To Sulistio Franky Subject RE Restricted access to the EOL Ticker App I would like to talk to you this after noon after about another chart let me know when dq Original Message From Sulistio Franky Sent Thursday October AM To Quigley Dutch Subject FYI Restricted access to the EOL Ticker App Original Message From Dronet David Sent Thursday October AM To Plachy Denver Pimenov Vladi Agarwalla Dipak Bajwa Bilal Bayer Adam Berutti Aaron Burk Bart Cardenas Catalina Chang Sheila Falik Brian Gaskill Chris Huble Amanda Kurdov Milen Lieskovsky Jozef Lo Jeremy OMalley Justin Pathak Neeran Schlesinger Lauren Cc Sulistio Franky Hyde Chris Subject urls for tickers Due to performance issues with our plasma screens we have restricted access to the EOL feeds to the plasma machines themselves You can however still access the NYMEX strip on the right utilizing the following links If you know anyone else who has need for this information please forward this email on to them Prod Nymex Financial fundyplasmasiteFinancialjsp Prod Nymex Financial with EOG fundyplasmasiteFinancialEOGjsp Prod Nymex Current fundyplasmasiteCurrentjsp Thanks Dave

FYI Restricted access to the EOL Ticker AppOriginal Message From Dronet David Sent Thursday October AM To Plachy Denver Pimenov Vladi Agarwalla Dipak Bajwa Bilal Bayer Adam Berutti Aaron Burk Bart Cardenas Catalina Chang Sheila Falik Brian Gaskill Chris Huble Amanda Kurdov Milen Lieskovsky Jozef Lo Jeremy OMalley Justin Pathak Neeran Schlesinger Lauren Cc Sulistio Franky Hyde Chris Subject urls for tickers Due to performance issues with our plasma screens we have restricted access to the EOL feeds to the plasma machines themselves You can however still access the NYMEX strip on the right utilizing the following links If you know anyone else who has need for this information please forward this email on to them Prod Nymex Financial fundyplasmasiteFinancialjsp Prod Nymex Financial with EOG fundyplasmasiteFinancialEOGjsp Prod Nymex Current fundyplasmasiteCurrentjsp Thanks Dave

Morning Duty Cc To all who will be doing the Morning Duty please take some time to check that all the plasmas are operational You can either walk to all the plasma screens or just VNC to it to make sure everything is working Dutch left me a voice mail to ask if I can reset the Financial plasma Unfortunately I was not here at AM For future reference would you morning duty person please monitor the plasma until I get here If you have problems getting the plasma up and running please send email to my pager Thanks Franky Sulistio Sr IT Specialist Enron Networks Ph Email franky nroncom Success hinges on a passion for excellence

Fundamentals Preference is fixedPST Hi Hunter Just to let you know that you should be able to set the preferences in the Fundamentals website Thanks Franky Sulistio Sr IT Specialist Enron Networks Ph Email franky nroncom Success hinges on a passion for excellence

Fundamentals Preference ErrorPST Hi Hunter We have asked webops to migrate the fix for the preferences problem that you encountered today As soon as the file is migrated I will send you another email so that you can save your preferences Thanks Franky Sulistio Sr IT Specialist Enron Networks Ph Email franky nroncom Success hinges on a passion for excellence

Market Data Applet Issues Cc Danielle Its been over or months where we continue to experience problems with the new Market Data applet The problems are ranging from the instability connection to the IFinance servers to the price update delay Over these past to months we kept getting hammerred by our business users tradersetc about these problems and these problems certainly reflected really bad on us as the IT support group on the trading floor Rick Le has been doing excellent supports for us We are not trying to point finger to anyone in your group but we need to push these issues to Reuters and let them know that these issues should be priority number for them to fix Its our impression that Reuters do not take these issues very seriously as the evidence showed that we dont have any acceptable solutions today after waiting for months As we move to the new building next week we will display the Market Data in more than plasma workstations The aboved mentioned problems will definitely make support very difficult If these problems are not fixed in the near future we may have to seriously consider other options With the telerate version of the market data being more stable than the new Market Data applet we may have to go back to use it Would you please help us provide better IT support to our business users Thanks Franky Sulistio Sr IT Specialist Enron Networks Ph Email franky nroncom Success hinges on a passion for excellence
